summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1254, for the improvement of Boren Avenue, from the connection with the existing sewer in Union Street to a connection with the existing sewer in Pike Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing therein a sewer of proper dimensions and material, together with all necessary appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 13767 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
